Chapter 2 Load data and packages 2.1 Install packages 2.2 Load the dataset

Chapter 2 Load data and packages This section is to load the packages and extract the data. 2.1 Install packages Here you will need the following packages: ggplot sf data.table cowplot rnaturalearth dplyr ggspatial gganimate png leaflet rnaturalearthdata with devtools::install_github("ropensci/rnaturalearthdata") To install packages: use install.packages("name of package") 2.2 Load the dataset birdsurvey <- fread("Birdsurvey_2011_2021.csv") Check if we have the right period from 2011 to 2021 min(birdsurvey$year) ## [1] 2011 max(birdsurvey$year) ## [1] 2021 Check the number of species and the type of species uniqueN(birdsurvey$species) ## [1] 10 unique(birdsurvey$species) ## [1] "Fratercula arctica" "Bubo scandiacus" ## [3] "Clangula hyemalis" "Rissa tridactyla" ## [5] "Euphagus carolinus" "Hesperiphona vespertina" ## [7] "Oceanodroma leucorhoa" "Podiceps auritus" ## [9] "Chaetura pelagica" "Emberiza aureola"
